name: Liminal Shooter
description:
Oh no! You've somehow fallen into some kind of backrooms, liminal space. Good thing there are all these guns lying around!

Shoot your way through hordes of vague horrors, learn how to clip through walls, find the secret levels, and try your best to reach floor 50 in this arcade-style third-person shooter!

This game was originally made as a final project for my game design class, I've spent the past few weeks polishing it up and adding more content. I hope you enjoy it!
